mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Users(userNickname,userName,userPassword,userEmail,userImage) VALUES( #{userNickname}, #{userName}, #{userPassword}, #{userEmail}, #{userImage} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE userNickname = #{userNickname}, userName = #{userName}, userPassword = #{userPassword}, userStatus = #{userStatus}, userPoint = #{userPoint}, userEmail = #{userEmail}, userImage = #{userImage}
mapper.update: UPDATE Users SET userNickname = #{userNickname}, userName = #{userName}, userPassword = #{userPassword}, userStatus = #{userStatus}, userPoint = #{userPoint}, userEmail = #{userEmail}, userImage = #{userImage} WHERE userIdx =#{userIdx}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM Users WHERE userStatus=#{status} And userNickname LIKE CONCAT('%',#{word},'%')
SELECT count(*) as cntCoupon FROM Users as u LEFT JOIN UserCoupons as uc ON u.userIdx=uc.userIdx WHERE u.userIdx=#{userIdx} AND uc.couponStatus=0 GROUP BY u.userIdx;
